channel.title: I found a program thing that i always use!
channel.description:
[b] If you do not feel safe do not download! [/b]
Ok it records your Mouse and when you move it it records, then you can playback, and it will do the exact same, so when i click "RECORD" when im done i click Play and it with go and go and go and go for ever.. I did not make this idk who did but its cool!
[url=http://www.uploadyour.info/download.php?filename=ghostmouserecorder68063.exe]Ghost Mouse Recorder[/url]
You can Virus check all you want, if there is a bug tell me and i will delete this, I have not came accross one, and never got banned on RS!

item.title: I found a program thing that i always use!
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

leet_java_ftw:

pfft, it’s not a virus… Why is everyone always so skeptical.

Because a lot of people do post viruses/malicious files. Its better to be skeptical and cautious than overly trusting imo.

Read full topic

eh…how does rs record mouse movement through a web browser? and if the screen moves ever so slightly, then wouldnt that throw off their mouse recording tech?
[/quote]
they always get the relative position of the mouse to the applet, go learn javalol[/quote]plz it use the exe hax its vb6 lal! plz learnvb

item.title: I found a program thing that i always use!
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Ghost Mice don’t work anymore, because the RuneScape screen moves so slightly that you wont even notice, but if the ghost mouse always clicks in the same spot on the screen… Whenever the RuneScape screen moves enough, eventually it will move you off your desired path. Sorry for bringing back an old post, just thought you guys should know.

Read full topic
item.source: I found a program thing that i always use!

item.title: I found a program thing that i always use!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Inching Away:

=/ What if it isn’t what you suppose it is.

Do a google search for ghost mouse, I ran that a few years ago and used it for almost a month and nothing bad came from it.

Trust me though, NOD32 and Kaspersky didn’t pick anything up and those two are really good scanners, and if you want to use it but don’t trust scan results, just simply block all internet access. NOD32 AND Kaspersky couldn’t both miss a deadly virus.

Read full topic
item.source: I found a program thing that i always use!

item.source: I found a program thing that i always use!

item.title: I found a program thing that i always use!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Inching Away, post:4, topic:86708”]They had that on www.rs2cheating.com. I’m not sure if it’s any safe so I won’t download it just yet.

Edit: This is infected!

[/quote]

It’s a coincidence that the only scanners to pick it up are 3 small non known scanners.

If your scared to use this, keep in mind a trojan usually does stuff the scanner might not know that you want it to do, for example, this records mouse movements and clicks, the scanner flags it because it might not know you want it to record your mouse details.

Read full topic
